logic.logicTransfer

Interface GUIConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeGUI, JavaFXGUI

    public interface GUIConnector
    method the logic needs to display current gamestatus on gui.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void blurOtherFields(PossibleField saturatedField)
      Given Field stays focused but all other fields are blured out to indicate where the human player is supposed to make his next move
      void deleteDomFromBank(int ordBank, int idx)
      Deletes a domino from a bank
      void selectDomino(int ordBank, int idxDom, int ordPlayer)
      Selects a domino from a given bank with a given index and player
      void setToBank(int ordBank, Bank bank)
      sets a domino to the players bank at index.
      void showInChooseBox(Domino dominoRotated)
      shows the domino in the choose-box.
      void showOnGrid(int ordPlayer, Domino domino)
      shows the images corresponding to the two values on grid.
      void showPointsForPlayer(int ordPlayer, int boardPoints)
      Shows players points.
      void showPopUp(java.lang.String text)
      Shows popup window with the given message
      void showResult(Result result)
      presents the results.
      void showWhosTurn(int ordPlayer)
      displays the given name as has to turn.
      void updatePlayer(Player player)
      updates all data concerning a certain player (board, districts, points, etc.)

    • Method Detail

      • showWhosTurn

        void showWhosTurn(int ordPlayer)
        displays the given name as has to turn.
        Parameters:
        ordPlayer - ordinal value of the player who's currently doing his turn

      • setToBank

        void setToBank(int ordBank,
               Bank bank)
        sets a domino to the players bank at index. Empties it if domino is null.
        Parameters:
        ordBank - ordinal value of the bank that will be updated (0 for current, 1 for next bank)
        bank - reference to the bank that will be displayed / updated on the gui

      • showInChooseBox

        void showInChooseBox(Domino dominoRotated)
        shows the domino in the choose-box. Clears it if dominoRotated is null.
        Parameters:
        dominoRotated - current domino of the human player

      • updatePlayer

        void updatePlayer(Player player)
        updates all data concerning a certain player (board, districts, points, etc.)
        Parameters:
        player - player to update gui section for

      • showOnGrid

        void showOnGrid(int ordPlayer,
                Domino domino)
        shows the images corresponding to the two values on grid.
        Parameters:
        ordPlayer - ordinal value of the current player
        domino - choosen domino to display on board

      • showResult

        void showResult(Result result)
        presents the results.
        Parameters:
        result - Result that will be shown in another window

      • showPointsForPlayer

        void showPointsForPlayer(int ordPlayer,
                         int boardPoints)
        Shows players points.
        Parameters:
        ordPlayer - ordinal value of the player
        boardPoints - points that should be displayed

      • selectDomino

        void selectDomino(int ordBank,
                  int idxDom,
                  int ordPlayer)
        Selects a domino from a given bank with a given index and player
        Parameters:
        ordBank - ordinal value of the bank
        idxDom - index of the domino that will be selected
        ordPlayer - ordinal value of the player the domino will be selected with

      • deleteDomFromBank

        void deleteDomFromBank(int ordBank,
                       int idx)
        Deletes a domino from a bank
        Parameters:
        ordBank - ordinal value of the bank from which the domino will be deleted
        idx - index of the domino that will be deleted

      • showPopUp

        void showPopUp(java.lang.String text)
        Shows popup window with the given message
        Parameters:
        text - masseage to display in the popup window

      • blurOtherFields

        void blurOtherFields(PossibleField saturatedField)
        Given Field stays focused but all other fields are blured out to indicate where the human player is supposed to make his next move
        Parameters:
        saturatedField - field that's currently in focus, may be null -> blur will be removed from every field
